Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Score Description
1 Weak Armor 4 Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
18 Screen Cleaner 4 Entering a battle nullifies the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
36 Clear Body 5 Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
54 Refraction 7 Boosts the power of Beam-type moves.
72 Prism Armor 7 Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
90 Mirror Armor 9 Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.
100 Magic Guard 12 The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

Ability Score Description
Flood Surge 9 Turns the ground into Flooded Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
